name: Witch Hazel
description:
A short, simple and odd adventure platformer made for #metajam-  we hope you enjoy :D Controls:
  • Up Arrow = Open Doors, Interact
  • Down Arrow = Crouch, Crawl, Interact, Charge
  • Left/ Right Arrows = Move Left and Right, Run
  • Z = Jump
  • X = Attack, Charge magic
  • Enter = Pause
  • F = toggle fullscreen/windowed
